page.title: 04Transport-Severn Valley/Wyre
page.content: {Roads}2 miles of B4194 cross the SW corner with several miles of unmade roads, for forestry traffic only, leading into the forest. East of the river, tracks up to 1 mile long lead from about 3 miles of narrow tarmac road to farms and riverside chalets. {Trains}Severn Valley Railway- Request Stop for Bridgnorth and Kidderminster directions. Daily in Summer every 1-2 hours, weekends only in Spring/Autumn. {Buses}Passing SE corner for Bewdley & Kidderminster-hourly on weekdays, 2 services only on Sundays. Trimpley to Bridgnorth/ Kidderminster weekdays only, every 2 hours. B4194 -5 services each way on weekdays but 1 only on Sundays. {School buses}for children to Bewdley and Upper Arley from Trimpley and Dowles leaving 8.15-8.30 am and returning 3.30-3.45 pm on school days.
